mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_ev_course ( ev_report_id, course_id, account_id, delete_flg, first_create_user, first_create_date, last_modified_user, last_modified_date ) VALUES ( #{evReportId}, #{courseId}, #{accountId}, #{deleteFlg}, #{firstCreateUser}, #{firstCreateDate}, #{lastModifiedUser}, #{lastModifiedDate} )
